option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: docker manifest rm forome/dorieh:latest && docker manifest create forome/dorieh:latest forome/dorieh:amd64 forome/dorieh:arm64 && docker manifest annotate forome/dorieh:latest forome/dorieh:amd64 --arch amd64 && docker manifest annotate forome/dorieh:latest forome/dorieh:arm64 --arch arm64 && docker manifest push forome/dorieh:latest
